EmailTemplate.description: Solution Provided to the Customer, triggered manually
EmailTemplate.name: Solution Provided
EmailTemplate.subject: Solution Provided: {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Subject}, {!Case.Reference_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact}, Based on investigation and analysis, I’ve determined the solution for this Case, with the reported issue of: {!Case.Subject}.
The solution for the issue reported is defined as: {!Case.CH_SolutionDetails__c}
I believe this solution solves the issue reported, and is provided as the final solution for the issue reported.
As a reminder of this Case, the Case number is {!Case.CaseNumber} for the {!Case.Type} Case, with the Product identified as {!Case.Product} reported to Nokia at {!Case.CH_ReportedDate__c}.
Should you need to follow up on this case, please use this Case Number as reference.
If you would like to view or update your case online, please click here:
Regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName}
